General.Name: Shaanxi Yanchang Petroleum Chemical Engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: Shaanxi Construction Engineering Group Corporation Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in general engineering construction business in China and internationally. It undertakes the general contracting of municipal public, petrochemical, highway, decoration, ancient building landscaping, urban rail transit, and other projects. The company is also involved in the production and installation of steel structures; production and distribution of building materials, such as heating, electrical installation materials, various decorative materials, and aluminum formwork and scaffolding; distribution and supply of sales equipment and materials; research and development, and production of boilers; provision of logistics and distribution services; and development and construction of real estate properties. In addition, it engages in product sales, medical, healthcare, education, tourism, hotel management, and other businesses, as well as provides engineering supervision consultation services. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Xi'an, China. Shaanxi Construction Engineering Group Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of Top International Engineering Corporation.

2.Name: Mr. Xin  He
2.Title: Chief Financial Officer and Chief Legal Officer
